attributes.action: direct all  MP s expenses refunds to charity/returning soldiers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with all these m.p.s now admitting to abusing the claim system , i think that all the money they have paid back should go to charity or to helping soldiers injured in the war.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
